sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { UilTemperature, UilTear, UilWind, UilSun, UilSunset, } from "@iconscout/react-unicons"; import { formatToLocalTime, iconUrlFromCode } from "../services/weatherService"; import { weatherDesc } from "./genMongolia"; function TemperatureAndDetails({ weather: { details, icon, temp, temp_min, temp_max, sunrise, sunset, speed, humidity, feels_like, timezone, }, }) { return (

{ weatherDesc(details) }

{`${temp.toFixed()}°`}

Мэдрэгдэх температур: {`${feels_like.toFixed()}°`}
Чийгшил: {`${humidity.toFixed()}%`}
Салхи: {`${speed.toFixed()} км/ц`}

Нар мандах:{" "} {formatToLocalTime(sunrise, timezone, "HH:mm")}

|

Нар жаргах:{" "} {formatToLocalTime(sunset, timezone, "HH:mm")}

|

Өндөр температур:{" "} {`${temp_max.toFixed()}°`}

|

Бага температур:{" "} {`${temp_min.toFixed()}°`}

); } export default TemperatureAndDetails;
